item.title: WINk
item.dc:creator: CryptoSlate Coins
item.description:
WINk (formerly TRONBet) is a betting DApp based on the TRC20 WIN token.  Within the WINk platform, WIN is the token used to incentivize active participation from key stakeholders i.e., developers and users. WINk platform currently supports TRX, DICE (TRC20), and BTT (TRC10) to be used on the platform, with other tokens coming soon.

The post WINk appeared first on CryptoSlate.
item.content:encoded:

item.title: BFG Token
item.dc:creator: CryptoSlate Coins
item.description:
BFG is the native BEP-20 token of the BetFury ecosystem, initially launched on the Binance Smart Chain network. The number of BFG supporters has surpassed 67,000 token holders. BFG holders can trade, play, stake BFG, and be rewarded with the highest APRs, discounts, and bonuses based on their token holdings. In addition, the BFG token […]

The post BFG Token appeared first on CryptoSlate.
item.content:encoded:
BFG is the native BEP-20 token of the BetFury ecosystem, initially launched on the Binance Smart Chain network. The number of BFG supporters has surpassed 67,000 token holders.

BFG holders can trade, play, stake BFG, and be rewarded with the highest APRs, discounts, and bonuses based on their token holdings. In addition, the BFG token can be used to earn on exchanges such as PancakeSwap and Biswap.

While benefiting from BFG on the platform and beyond, the token is being secured by strong CertiK. It ensures BFG’s safety by thoroughly examining its smart contract code.

Over the years, the BFG token has undergone many changes. Its maximum supply is 5 billion, and the token minting process has ended. According to our robust deflationary mechanisms, the token will strategically strengthen and gain more value in the market.

The post BFG Token appeared first on CryptoSlate.

item.title: Shuffle
item.dc:creator: CryptoSlate Coins
item.description:
Shuffle, a prominent crypto casino renowned for its exceptional user experience and trustworthiness, was launched on February 1st, 2023. The introduction of the Shuffle Token (SHFL) marks a significant stride towards enhancing the overall crypto casino experience. SHFL Token Features and Innovations Players utilizing SHFL have expressed dissatisfaction with conventional casinos due to subpar user […]

The post Shuffle appeared first on CryptoSlate.
item.content:encoded:
Shuffle, a prominent crypto casino renowned for its exceptional user experience and trustworthiness, was launched on February 1st, 2023. The introduction of the Shuffle Token (SHFL) marks a significant stride towards enhancing the overall crypto casino experience.

SHFL Token Features and Innovations

Players utilizing SHFL have expressed dissatisfaction with conventional casinos due to subpar user experiences, lackluster bonuses, and native tokens that fail to enhance gameplay. SHFL is poised to revolutionize the casino industry by introducing innovations like Wager-to-Vest, enhancing user engagement through airdrop campaigns, and prioritizing active users to elevate the gaming experience.

SHFL Token Circulation and Utilities

The SHFL token, with a total supply of 1,000,000,000, was launched on March 14, 2024, with 39,316,004 tokens sold through a liquidity bootstrapping pool (LBP). The circulating supply includes tokens from the LBP, liquidity reserves, and a portion of Airdrop 1, with additional supply generated through vested airdrops and liquidity mining. SHFL’s utilities encompass serving as a wager asset, implementing a buyback-and-burn mechanism, and granting holders exclusive access to new features and bonuses.

Founders and Vision of Shuffle

Founded by Noah Dummett, Bainy Zhang, and Darcy Spangler, Shuffle’s team brings extensive experience from leading web3 entities like Alameda Research, Bitmex, and Three Arrows Capital. With a focus on delivering an immersive and secure gaming environment, the team aims to establish SHFL as the premier destination for crypto gaming enthusiasts, leveraging blockchain technology for transparency, fairness, and cutting-edge features.

The post Shuffle appeared first on CryptoSlate.

item.title: Revain
item.dc:creator: CryptoSlate Coins
item.description:
Revain is blockchain-based review platform for crypto community. REV is Revain’s main token which was issued in September 2017. Revain consists of 7 main sections: projects, exchanges, wallets, games, casinos, mining pools and cards. In each section every company is ranked based on their user rating and number of reviews. Revain’s ultimate goal is to […]

The post Revain appeared first on CryptoSlate.
item.content:encoded:
Revain is blockchain-based review platform for crypto community. REV is Revain’s main token which was issued in September 2017.

Revain consists of 7 main sections: projects, exchanges, wallets, games, casinos, mining pools and cards. In each section every company is ranked based on their user rating and number of reviews.

Revain’s ultimate goal is to provide high-quality and authentic user feedback on all global products and services using new emerging technologies like blockchain and machine learning.

The post Revain appeared first on CryptoSlate.

VEMP can be used to interact with immersive play-to-earn games to earn better rewards in the […]

The post vEmpire DDAO appeared first on CryptoSlate.
item.content:encoded:
vEmpire DDAO is a decentralized metaverse investment organization. It incorporates different strategies to incentivize Metaverse token staking to fund the battle against centralisation. Its goal is to focus on protecting decentralized technologies through virtual property and Metaversal asset acquisition.

VEMP can be used to interact with immersive play-to-earn games to earn better rewards in the DDAO.

The post vEmpire DDAO appeared first on CryptoSlate.

item.title: Decentral Games
item.dc:creator: CryptoSlate Coins
item.description:
decentral.games is a community-owned metaverse casino ecosystem powered by $DG. Players earn $DG for playing games, LPs earn $DG for providing liquidity, and active $DG holders earn $DG by governing the allocation of house profits.

item.title: Sportbet.one Token
item.dc:creator: CryptoSlate Coins
item.description:
SBET is a utility token on Sportbet.one, a decentralized sports betting platform built on the EOS blockchain. The platform utilizes EOS’s Delegated Proof of Stake (DPoS) consensus mechanism, providing fast transaction speeds and efficient smart contract execution. Sportbet.one is different from many traditional sportsbooks in that it doesn’t require identity verification. Users benefit from transparent […]

The post Sportbet.one Token appeared first on CryptoSlate.
item.content:encoded:
SBET is a utility token on Sportbet.one, a decentralized sports betting platform built on the EOS blockchain. The platform utilizes EOS’s Delegated Proof of Stake (DPoS) consensus mechanism, providing fast transaction speeds and efficient smart contract execution. Sportbet.one is different from many traditional sportsbooks in that it doesn’t require identity verification. Users benefit from transparent betting processes and quick payouts directly to their wallets.

The post Sportbet.one Token appeared first on CryptoSlate.

item.title: Polker
item.dc:creator: CryptoSlate Coins
item.description:
PKR (PKR) is a global utility token movement powered by a number of patented protocols that are aimed at addressing common problems in the blockchain industry. The ecosystem is working to provide fair gameplay for online gaming, create a true random number generator, contribute to the introduction of interoperability to the cryptocurrency scene and build […]

The post Polker appeared first on CryptoSlate.
item.content:encoded:
PKR (PKR) is a global utility token movement powered by a number of patented protocols that are aimed at addressing common problems in the blockchain industry. The ecosystem is working to provide fair gameplay for online gaming, create a true random number generator, contribute to the introduction of interoperability to the cryptocurrency scene and build a secure environment for the launch of new projects in the industry.

Before growing into a multifunctional ecosystem PKR had the main goal of building a crypto-poker gaming protocol called Polker. At the present time Polker.game is the first NFT, play-to-earn blockchain-based game powered by PKR.

The platform’s utility token PKR serves to maintain the economy inside of the ecosystem. As stated in the official whitepaper, staking of the PKR allows holders to receive an annual percentage yield, which will slowly reduce over time as the PKR’s Total Value Locked (TVL) increases.

PKR token first went live in June 2021. The game testnet deployment took place towards the end of 2021 with the launch on the mainnet coming in the first quarter of 2022.

The post Polker appeared first on CryptoSlate.
